meanings.sent1: The graupel fell softly on the ground.
meanings.sent2: I felt the graupel hitting my face as I walked outside.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to catch the graupel on their tongues.
meanings.sent4: The graupel looked like tiny pearls scattered across the lawn.
meanings.sent5: The graupel sparkled in the sunlight, creating a magical winter scene.

meanings.definition: A type of precipitation formed when supercooled water droplets freeze onto snowflakes.
meanings.sent1: The graupel formed as the water droplets froze onto the snowflakes.
meanings.sent2: We could see the graupel forming on the branches of the trees.
meanings.sent3: The graupel clung to the snowflakes like tiny frozen magnets.
meanings.sent4: The graupel transformed the delicate snowflakes into icy pellets.
meanings.sent5: The graupel coating the snowflakes created a unique texture in the snow.
